es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api.guides

Interface IGuideValueAxisController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGuideController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuideValueAxisController

    public interface IGuideValueAxisController
extends IGuideController
    Interface for GuideValueAxisController. This interface contains properties of guide only used by ValueAxis. Details of Guide and its properties in AmCharts API.
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
